name: Quizzd
description:
Description

Quizzd is a Cool Free Trivia Game for Android. It is a Sci-fi Glitch-themed Trivia game. Test your Knowledge and boost your Trivia Skills with this Awesome Trivia Game.

Play quizzes from different categories such as Technology, Science, Music, Entertainment, History, Geography and many more!

Make your own Game Character with an Avatar to choose from more than 15+ Choices!

Features
  • Quizzd Contains 200+ Trivia questions to play and have Unlimited Fun!
  • The game has four modes:- Classic Quiz, Highscore Frenzy, Picture Trivia, and True or False.
  • Customise your Game Profile with your personalised Username and Avatar.
  • Play all game modes and try to win all 15 Achievements!
Credits
  • Icon - silver cup icon
 Sound Effects
  • Effect 1 - Glitch Effect
  • Effect 2 - Correct Answer
  • Effect 3 - Game Over
